title: COKI Explorer
desc: My final year university project, developing a research publication search engine using React and Redux.

title: TravelEA
desc: Full stack travel/social media web application developed in a team of eight using agile methodologies during my third year at University.

title: CryptoBot
desc: Discord bot and separate API that can be used to quickly retrieve crypto prices, data and more!

title: rogur
desc: rogur is a clone of the Uber app built using a MERN stack.

title: COVIDaily
desc: Simple android app built using Kotlin that retrieves and displays relevant statistics/news about COVID-19 in your country.

title: PocketCHEF
desc: Simple android app built using Kotlin that allows you to create, view and share cooking/baking recipes.
